html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-02702023-03-27CIRNAC
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectOrder Consenting to the Amendment of the Tr’ondëk Hwëch’in Self-Government Agreement
PrecisOrder consenting to the amendment of section 17.7 of the TR’ONDËK HWËCH’IN SELF-GOVERNMENT AGREEMENT and sections 17.2 and 17.8 to 17.10 of the French version in order to: (1) allow for negotiation of responsibility for education; and (2) update the original French language to better align with the policy intention of the Parties.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Consenting to the Amendment of the Tr’ondëk Hwëch’in Self-Government Agreement
precis: Order consenting to the amendment of section 17.7 of the TR’ONDËK HWËCH’IN SELF-GOVERNMENT AGREEMENT and sections 17.2 and 17.8 to 17.10 of the French version in order to: (1) allow for negotiation of responsibility for education; and (2) update the original French language to better align with the policy intention of the Parties.
